author: Suyūrī, al-Miqdād ibn ʻAbd Allāh, -1423
contents: 1. fol. 1b-43b: al-Nāfiʻ fī yawm al-ḥashar fī sharḥ al-Bāb al-ḥādī ʻashar.

extent: 62 leaves : paper ; 219 x 152 mm. bound to 221 x 158 mm.
